alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 1:44PM CST until December 13 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Davis Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 5 PM CST this afternoon. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
